com.navis.framework.persistence.hibernate

Interface ISessionManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultSessionManager

    public interface ISessionManager
    Manager for Hibernate Session.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void commit()
      Commits current transaction.
      void rollback(java.lang.Throwable inException, MessageCollector inCollector)
      Rolls back current transaction.
      void setUpSession()
      Sets up a Hibernate session.
      void tearDownSession()
      Closes current Hibernate session.
